msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Hmmm<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whatever Reckon we just have a new landmark for when we're givin' directions anywhere on the island!

<20_3 arg="10" />Just thinkin' about sleepin' on the ground makes my back ache<20_2 arg="9" />So I reckon I'm glad someone left out .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You know, just in case I feel an outdoor nap comin' on
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_3 arg="9" />Huh, outdoor television <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What'll they think of next, ?
<20_2 arg="10" />Why would someone leave out <20_2 arg="9" />?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Maybe we could throw an outdoor listenin' party
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whose is this?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Better leave it be an' see if anyone claims it. Guess only time will tell! Get it? Gahaha!

They say talkin' at plants helps 'em grow, but does that work outdoors?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Um Heya! How's your day goin'?<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hrm, I dunno Think that helped?<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Seem any healthier to you?
<20_3 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Not so sure about open-air bathin'<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No one wants to see my wrinkly ol' carcass gettin' out of a tub!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Seems like an odd place for sippin' coffee and eatin' donuts.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But donut worry, I reckon I could make it work for me! Gahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nice of someone to give me a place to sit and take a li'l breather out in the middle of nature<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Does my heart good, seein' someone bein' considerate!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ain't the best at playin' them things, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />but I'm OK with a pair of maracas.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Someone's been cookin' alfresco! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />There's somethin' special about a meal grilled up outdoors
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!I could honestly use more exercise<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Not sure I'd wanna work out in the open, though I guess most of my exercise is from walkin' around.
<20_2 arg="10" />Do you get a campin' vibe from<20_2 arg="9" /> ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Makes me wanna roast marshmallows and start some sing-alongs
